document_data.name: Nanther
document_data.mainbody: '''Nanther''' was a noble family of [[Melvaunt]] in the [[Moonsea]] region in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was the most influential mercantile house of Melvaunt ''circa'' the year [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Woarsten Nanther]], Lord of the family.
* [[Oreal Nanther]], heir of the family.
* [[Dundeld Nanther]], patriarch of the Nanther family.
* [[Killian Kreel]] (previously Killian Nanther), fallen prodigy of the family.
* [[Lyran Nanther]] would-be ruler of [[Shadowdale]].
